name: Unfinished Battle
detailed_description:
Unfinished Battle is a fast paced rts game. Your mission is destroying the other castle and protect your own at the same time. Kill enemies earn gold and deploy more units. Finish this battle at all cost!

  • 20 Level campaign.

  • Boss Levels.

  • Different strategy for each level.

  • Medieval to Metal music that will put you in the game mood.

  • Extreme hard to finish.

  • New levels will come after if anyone can finish current ones.

    Potential Future Patch Notes:

    -We are thinking about adding LAN Multiplayer firstly
    -Online multiplayer
    -At least 20+ new characters (some of them ready already)
    -Different strategies and animations for online.
    -In game item market, skins, different form of characters.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows (64-bit versions only)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon HD 6670 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

Recommended:
